title: Help with these two typefaces please
content:
The top sans and the bottom serif as indicated. Thanks!

author: labelmonkey

comments.content:
the top one is eurostile extended 2 i think.  
the bottom one is familiar but is stumping me.

Help with font also  
What is this font?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122062658im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/_5256)
It is very similar to Eurostile, but the cap E is different. It could do though, thanks.

’GRILL’ is almost certainly ’Brothers Regular’ by Emigre Fonts.

[http://www.emigre.com/EF.php?fid=83](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122062658/http:/www.emigre.com/EF.php?fid=83 "http://www.emigre.com/EF.php?fid=83")

JH
